# IORecursiveLockHaveLock | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ DriverKit ](/documentation/driverkit)

- [ IORecursiveLockHaveLock ](/documentation/driverkit/iorecursivelockhavelock)

-  IORecursiveLockHaveLock 

Function# IORecursiveLockHaveLock

DriverKitiOSiPadOSmacOS

```
bool IORecursiveLockHaveLock(struct IORecursiveLock * lock);
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/driverkit/iorecursivelockhavelock#parameters)

`lock`Pointer to the allocated lock.

## [Return Value](/documentation/driverkit/iorecursivelockhavelock#return-value)

True if the calling thread holds the lock otherwise false.

## [Discussion](/documentation/driverkit/iorecursivelockhavelock#discussion)

Check if a recursive lock is held by the calling thread.

If the lock is held by the calling thread, return true, otherwise the lock is unlocked, or held by another thread and false is returned.
